hypothesis_content.title: BTC Liquidity Compression Breakout
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC consolidates within a 5% range for 7+ days during NEUTRAL regime, a breakout above the range high on >1.5x average volume will lead to a directional move of 8-12% in the breakout direction over the next 5 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Extended low-volatility periods in crypto often precede significant directional moves as liquidity builds on one side. The volume confirmation filters out false breakouts.
entry_conditions: BTC daily close within ±2.5% of 7-day moving average for 7 consecutive days
Daily volume < 20% above 30-day average during consolidation
Breakout candle closes >1% above consolidation range high
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakout fails to sustain >5% move within 3 days or reverses below range midpoint with increasing volume.
